explanation: The majority of sentiment indicates bullishness, with several participants referencing price moving 'north,' expectations of reaching higher price levels (108, 109, 109700), and trend lines holding as support around 107. There are mentions of large sell walls, but the conversation tilts toward further upside before any major reversal. Some caution about liquidations and stop-losses, but the bullish bias dominates.
